messages.content: The only way to stop Labour and beat Jeremy Corbyn is to vote Liberal Democrat here in Ealing Central and Acton.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The only way to stop Labour and beat Jeremy Corbyn is to vote Liberal Democrat here in Ealing Central and Acton.

issues.brexitEurope: We must stop Brexit and focus again on issues that matter like the climate emergency, sustainable development and our public services.
issues.environment: Tackle Climate Change; fight against Climate Change.

community.content: improving Animal Welfare standards across the globe

leaflet.personalStatement: Sonul Badiani, a local Ealing Mum, is confident, clear and hard-working. A linguist with a background in Law, she works in the charity sector where she's dedicated her career to the fight against Climate Change and improving Animal Welfare standards across the globe.

politicalExperience.achievements: Dedicated her career to the fight against Climate Change and improving Animal Welfare standards across the globe.

examples: Estimated European Election results 2019 in Ealing Central and Acton: Lab 20%, Con 8%, Lib Dem 36% - Source: Prof. Chris Hanretty, Royal Holloway University
